short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your digital experience with SmartAssist.
short.ko: 스마트어시스트로 디지털 경험을 간편하게 만들어 보세요. 이메일 자동완성부터 안전한 자동 스킾까지, 올인원 편의 도구입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a handy tool that auto-fills usernames for certain websites during the login process and skips the login steps.

It saves the username you entered on the first login page.
On the second page, it auto-fills the saved username and simplifies the login process by clicking the "Next" button, providing a faster and more efficient experience.
The extension includes a toggle button in the settings to enable or disable the feature as needed.
Key Features:
Automatic username saving and filling
Automatic login step
Intuitive pop-up UI for easy control
Note: This extension only works on the specified URL and the saved data is safely stored in your browser's local storage.
